wordGroup: amnesty international 国际特赦组织

sentences.en: Amnesty workers have been barred from the country since 1982.
sentences.cn: 自1982年以来特赦的工人被禁止进入该国。

sentences.en: A general amnesty for political prisoners may be in the offing.
sentences.cn: 可能即将对政治犯实行大赦。

sentences.en: Critics say this amounts to a backdoor amnesty for illegal aliens.
sentences.cn: 评论家认为这等于是对非法移民的变相特赦。
